nodes.text: The 5M-Sec Droid was a model of hulking, three-legged security droid used by the Galactic Empire. At the time of the Iron Blockade, one such droid guarded the site of a chromium mine near Wickridge, Burnin Konn, where the Jedi Khandra and Nuhj had once been killed by a member of the Imperial Inquisitorius.
